directions: Combine white rice flour, brown rice flour, cornmeal, potato starch, cornstarch, onion powder, seasoned salt, multi-colored pepper, sea salt, and paprika in an an airtight container or resealable plastic bag.
ingredients: 1 tablespoon seasoned salt (such as Jane's Krazy Mixed-Up Salt®)
1 tablespoon ground multi-colored pepper, or more to taste
2 teaspoons sea salt, or to taste
title: Gluten-Free Breading and Gravy Mix
